article_text: Income projections based on panhandling, barter and illegal activity have gotten hundreds of homeless people insurance at federal expense – and prompted a closer look at the Charlotte agent who made the sales. He says he’s helping, but advocates for the homeless say they’re worse off than before.

article_metadata.title: Charlotte health insurance broker’s tactics raise questions | The Charlotte Observer

He says he’s helping, but advocates for the homeless say they’re worse off than before.
Income projections based on panhandling, barter and illegal activity have gotten hundreds of homeless people insurance at federal expense – and prompted a closer look at the Charlotte agent who made the sales.
